title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Lunchbox
itunes:title: Best Bits with Morgan and Special Guest Lunchbox
description:
It’s always a fun conversation when Morgan brings on Lunchbox! Lunchbox shared some life updates about his children, they talk about Costco vs. Sam’s Club, and the dream jobs they wanted as children. Morgan is getting into something that Lunchbox is concerned about, and Lunchbox is mind blown by a documentary on Netflix.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
